comment: Tim's explanation of server-side Swift was absolutely brilliant! The practical examples really helped me understand how to implement Vapor in my projects.
Great talk on server-side Swift! The live coding demonstrations were excellent. Would love to see more advanced deployment strategies.
Outstanding presentation! Tim made server-side Swift accessible and exciting. The real-world examples were perfect.
Solid talk with great technical depth. The Vapor framework examples were exactly what I needed for my backend project.
Fantastic! Tim's passion for server-side Swift is contagious. I'm definitely going to try Vapor after this talk.
Excellent overview of Swift on the server! The performance comparisons with other backend languages were very insightful.
